recipesJson.name: Lemon Twist: Pink Punch Lemonade REMIX
recipesJson.author: ENYAWREKLAW
recipesJson.description:
This is a remix of LEMON TWISTS: PINK PUNCH LEMONADE.

It's quite close, and to be honest, I think its a bit better. It's more "pink" and isn't nearly as harsh, but still damn sweet. If you've had the original, i'm interested in your thoughts about this remix. 

Made on "Live Mixing: Pink Punch Lemonade" 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cGYRvxWUILk

reviews.text: Itâ€™s ok but not nearly as layered the round candy also gives it to me an off note that lingers on the palate, I find this harsh compared to the original and the strawberry element is lacking in this recipe compared to the original the original I pick undertones of flv pink guava as well this recipe seems to tart  but is still a nice recipe non the less just not very close
